points_of_interest.name: DCU Appts
points_of_interest.description: Student accommodation near Dublin City University.
points_of_interest.extra_info: Twin rooms in student housing, with shared common areas.

points_of_interest.name: St. Stephen’s Green & Book of Kells
points_of_interest.address: St. Stephen’s Green / Trinity College, Dublin
points_of_interest.description: Central park and historic library with the famous Book of Kells.
points_of_interest.extra_info: Popular with tourists; walking distance to shopping areas.

points_of_interest.name: Kilmainham Gaol
points_of_interest.description: Historic former prison with guided tours about Ireland’s independence.

points_of_interest.name: Guinness Storehouse
points_of_interest.description: Multi-story Guinness museum with rooftop bar.
points_of_interest.extra_info: Touristy but iconic, great views from Gravity Bar.

points_of_interest.name: Phoenix Park
points_of_interest.description: One of the largest enclosed parks in Europe; home to wild deer.
points_of_interest.extra_info: Great for a walk or picnic.

points_of_interest.name: Howth
points_of_interest.description: Coastal village with cliff walks and seafood restaurants.
points_of_interest.extra_info: 30 mins by DART; beautiful views and harbor seals.

points_of_interest.name: Dun Laoghaire
points_of_interest.description: Seaside town with long piers and the Forty Foot swimming spot.
points_of_interest.extra_info: Chill atmosphere, 30 mins from Dublin by DART.

points_of_interest.name: Dalkey & Killiney
points_of_interest.description: Upscale coastal area with hikes and celebrity homes.
points_of_interest.extra_info: 30 mins via DART; panoramic views from Killiney Hill.

points_of_interest.name: Glendalough & Wicklow Mountains
points_of_interest.description: Scenic glacial valley with monastic ruins and trails.
points_of_interest.extra_info: 1 hour by car or tour bus.

points_of_interest.name: Ryans Bar (Fri Location 7pm)
points_of_interest.description: Popular bar with a lively Friday evening crowd.
points_of_interest.extra_info: Great atmosphere, especially in the evenings.
